sentences.sContent: the areas affected by the hurricane
a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.sCn: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.sContent: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.sCn: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.sContent: ...Some believe take-home exams may affect students' performance in other courses...
...it will inevitably affect people’s health if they sit before computers and stare at the screens for long hours...
...They can affect a person's ability to get a job and qualification for benefits...
...have been shown to affect portion size and consumption...
...It mix all the decisions that affect theschool...
...affect the signaling of hormones and damage the liver — outcomes that sound suspiciously similar to what can happen after a person drinks too much alcohol...
...The report doesn’t really say how that information would affect consumer buying decisions...
...which in turn might seriously affect their life...
...He believes most diseases that commonly affect men could be addressed by preventive check-ups...

words.tran: 受到影响的；做作的；假装的
令人感动地；令人伤心地
影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation
